code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{getAccountDetails}from'../backend/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState({email:'',name:''});const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{getAccountDetails().then(data=>{setUser({email:data.data.email,name:data.data.username});}).catch(error=>{console.error('Errore nel recupero dei dettagli dell\'account:',error);navigate('/account/login');});},[navigate]);const softwareLinks=[{name:'Sales Hub',url:'https://app.huberway.com'},{name:'Marketing Hub',url:'https://campaign.huberway.com'},{name:'Totem',url:'https://totem-ps.huberway.com',restricted:true},{name:'Web Analytics',url:'https://analytics.huberway.com'}];const canAccessTotem=user.email==='direzione@psicopatici.com';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://cdn.huberway.com/site/logo-dark.svg",style:{height:"40px"},alt:"Huberway Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:["Hello, ",user.name]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"software-list dynamic",children:softwareLinks.map(software=>(!software.restricted||canAccessTotem)&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:software.url,className:"software-card dynamic-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:software.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Access ",software.name," tools and services"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-hover-effect"})]},software.name))})]});};export default Dashboard;
